Module cz.zcu.kiv.ir.silhavyj.searchengine
Package cz.zcu.kiv.ir.silhavyj.searchengine.index

Interface IIndex

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Index
    public interface IIndex
    Author:
    Jakub Silhavy Interface defining functionality of an inverted index.

      • addDocument

        void addDocument​(java.lang.String term,
                 int documentIndex,
                 java.lang.String filePath)
        Adds a document into the index.
        Parameters:
        term - term that has been found in a document
        documentIndex - index of the document where the term's been found
        filePath - path to the document

        Returns:
        filepath of a give document
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the document has not been indexed yet

      • index

        boolean index​(java.lang.String text,
              java.lang.String filePath)
        Indexes a document given as a piece of text
        Parameters:
        text - content of a document to be indexed
        filePath - filepath of the document
        Returns:
        True, if the document's been indexed successfully. False, otherwise.
